responses: Hi there, how can I help?
I can guide you through Coronavirus Symptoms
I can tell you what precautions to take
I can tell you how to strengthen your immune system
I can guide you to have a strong mental health

patterns: How do I know if I have COVID-19
responses: Navigating to Symptoms....     Fever, Dry Cough, Tiredness, Aches and Pains, Sore Throat, Diarrhoea, Conjunctivitis, Headache, Loss of taste or smell, A rash on skin, Discolouration of fingers or toes, Shortness of Breath, Chest Pain or Pressure, Loss of speech or movement, On noticing slightest of any symptoms visit your nearest Doctor

patterns: How do I stay away from COVID-19
responses: Navigating to Precautions....  Wear a Mask, Wash your hands at regular intervals, Keep a safe distance, Avoid touching your face and hair at all times, Stay Home and avoid travelling as much as possible, Cover your mouth with elbow or hankerchief on sneezing or coughing

patterns: How to build resistance to the virus
responses: Drink Hot Water - Take Bath twice a day - Stay Hydrated - Sleep enough (around 8-9 hours) - Keep your surrounding neat and clean - Workout everyday or or alternate days - Practise Meditation - Adhere to a strong healthy diet

patterns: How to improve your mental health
responses: Practise Meditation - Go outside for sometime and breathe fresh clean air - Read Books - Practise Yoga - Try and Learn new hobbies

patterns: I have coronavirus, what do I do
I have COVID-19, what do I do
responses: Don't Panic, stay quarantined for 14 Days, Eat healthy food, Practise mild exersice, Do Yoga and Meditation, Drink Luke Warm water every morning and before going to sleep, Maintain a safe distance from everyone, Wear a Mask, Stay Hydrated, Eat nutritious Food, It is normal to feel sad, stressed, or confused during a crisis. Talking to people you trust, such as friends and family, can help. If you feel overwhelmed, talk to a health worker or counsellor.
It aims at helping various patients to know about the virus and to spread right information about the virus
This project is done by a team of 6 highly aspirational students comprising of Tanay, Rahul, Keshava, Hriju, Dharmik, Soham

patterns: What initatives are taken by the government
responses: Social Distancing - Self Help - Atmanirbhar Bharat - Contactless delivery and transactions - Enforcement of Lockdown
